name: Mih And the Stuffs.
description:
Made this for my mom. Uploading it here just to see if it gets enough attention. Maybe ill make it into a real thing.

O is to open your hand, and W is to wave your hand when it is open. P is to point your hand back. If your hand reverts to pointing again, just wave again. Up key to open your panel. Try typing "hello".

Music used from Va11ha11a, and some Adventure Time game.

Store npcs owned by :

https://twitter.com/KonoConn

https://twitter.com/KiloTango18
